Genbrain Package¶

Core Module¶

class genbrain.core.Connections(numCells)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to hold data representing the connectivity of a collection of cells.

alias of SyanpseData

class genbrain.core.HysteresisMediatedMemory(columnDimensions=(2048, ), cellsPerColumn=32, activationThreshold=13, learningRadius=2048, initialPermanence=0.21, connectedPermanence=0.5, minThreshold=10, maxNewSynapseCount=20, permanenceIncrement=0.1, permanenceDecrement=0.1, seed=42)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class implementing the Hysteresis Mediated Memory algorithm.

activateCorrectlyPredictiveCells(prevPredictiveCells, activeColumns)[source]¶

Phase 1: Activate the correctly predictive cells. Pseudocode:

  • for each prev predictive cell - if in active column

    • mark it as active
    • mark it as winner cell
    • mark column as predicted

@param prevPredictiveCells (set) Indices of predictive cells in t-1 @param activeColumns (set) Indices of active columns in t @return (tuple) Contains:

activeCells (set), winnerCells (set), predictedColumns (set)
static activeSynapsesForSegment(segment, activeCells, connections)[source]¶

Returns the synapses on a segment that are active due to lateral input from active cells. @param segment (int) Segment index @param activeCells (set) Indices of active cells @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer @return (set) Indices of active synapses on segment

adaptSegment(segment, activeSynapses, connections)[source]¶

Updates synapses on segment. Strengthens active synapses; weakens inactive synapses. @param segment (int) Segment index @param activeSynapses (set) Indices of active synapses @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer

besHysMMatchingCell(cells, activeCells, connections)[source]¶

Gets the cell with the best matching segment (see HysMM.besHysMMatchingSegment) that has the largest number of active synapses of all best matching segments. If none were found, pick the least used cell (see HysMM.leastUsedCell). @param cells (set) Indices of cells @param activeCells (set) Indices of active cells @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer @return (tuple) Contains:

cell (int), bestSegment (int)
besHysMMatchingSegment(cell, activeCells, connections)[source]¶

Gets the segment on a cell with the largest number of activate synapses, including all synapses with non-zero permanences. @param cell (int) Cell index @param activeCells (set) Indices of active cells @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer @return (tuple) Contains:

segment (int), connectedActiveSynapses (set)
burstColumns(activeColumns, predictedColumns, prevActiveCells, prevWinnerCells, connections)[source]¶

Phase 2: Burst unpredicted columns. Pseudocode:

  • for each unpredicted active column - mark all cells as active - mark the best matching cell as winner cell

    • (learning) - if it has no matching segment

      • (optimization) if there are prev winner cells - add a segment to it
      • mark the segment as learning

@param activeColumns (set) Indices of active columns in t @param predictedColumns (set) Indices of predicted columns in t @param prevActiveCells (set) Indices of active cells in t-1 @param prevWinnerCells (set) Indices of winner cells in t-1 @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer @return (tuple) Contains:

activeCells (set), winnerCells (set), learningSegments (set)
cellsForColumn(column)[source]¶

Returns the indices of cells that belong to a column. @param column (int) Column index @return (set) Cell indices

columnForCell(cell)[source]¶

Returns the index of the column that a cell belongs to. @param cell (int) Cell index @return (int) Column index

compute(activeColumns, learn=True)[source]¶

Feeds input record through HysMM, performing inference and learning. Updates member variables with new state. @param activeColumns (set) Indices of active columns in t

computeFn(activeColumns, prevPredictiveCells, prevActiveSegments, prevActiveCells, prevWinnerCells, connections, learn=True)[source]¶

‘Functional’ version of compute. Returns new state. @param activeColumns (set) Indices of active columns in t @param prevPredictiveCells (set) Indices of predictive cells in t-1 @param prevActiveSegments (set) Indices of active segments in t-1 @param prevActiveCells (set) Indices of active cells in t-1 @param prevWinnerCells (set) Indices of winner cells in t-1 @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer @param learn (bool) Whether or not learning is enabled @return (tuple) Contains:

activeCells (set), winnerCells (set), activeSegments (set), predictiveCells (set)
computePredictiveCells(activeCells, connections)[source]¶

Phase 4: Compute predictive cells due to lateral input on distal dendrites. Pseudocode:

  • for each distal dendrite segment with activity >= activationThreshold - mark the segment as active - mark the cell as predictive

Forward propagates activity from active cells to the synapses that touch them, to determine which synapses are active. @param activeCells (set) Indices of active cells in t @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer @return (tuple) Contains:

activeSegments (set), predictiveCells (set)
learnOnSegments(prevActiveSegments, learningSegments, prevActiveCells, winnerCells, prevWinnerCells, connections)[source]¶

Phase 3: Perform learning by adapting segments. Pseudocode:

  • (learning) for each prev active or learning segment - if learning segment or from winner cell

    • strengthen active synapses
    • weaken inactive synapses

    • if learning segment - add some synapses to the segment

      • subsample from prev winner cells

@param prevActiveSegments (set) Indices of active segments in t-1 @param learningSegments (set) Indices of learning segments in t @param prevActiveCells (set) Indices of active cells in t-1 @param winnerCells (set) Indices of winner cells in t @param prevWinnerCells (set) Indices of winner cells in t-1 @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer

leastUsedCell(cells, connections)[source]¶

Gets the cell with the smallest number of segments. Break ties randomly. @param cells (set) Indices of cells @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer @return (int) Cell index

mapCellsToColumns(cells)[source]¶

Maps cells to the columns they belong to @param cells (set) Cells @return (dict) Mapping from columns to their cells in cells

numberOfCells()[source]¶

Returns the number of cells in this layer. @return (int) Number of cells

numberOfColumns()[source]¶

Returns the number of columns in this layer. @return (int) Number of columns

Pick cells to form distal connections to. TODO: Respect topology and learningRadius @param n (int) Number of cells to pick @param segment (int) Segment index @param winnerCells (set) Indices of winner cells in t @param connections (Connections) Connectivity of layer @return (set) Indices of cells picked

reset()[source]¶

Indicates the start of a new sequence. Resets sequence state of the HysMM.
